meanings.definition: The quality or state of being dutiful.
meanings.sent1: Her dutifulness in completing all her chores impressed her parents.
meanings.sent2: His dutifulness towards his elderly neighbor showed his kindness.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed dutifulness by bringing its owner a toy mouse as a gift.
meanings.sent4: The tree's dutifulness in providing shade to the garden was appreciated by all.
meanings.sent5: The soldier's dutifulness in following orders saved his comrades in battle.

meanings.sent1: The teacher's dutifulness in grading papers late into the night was admirable.
meanings.sent2: The nurse's dutifulness in caring for patients made her a beloved figure in the hospital.
meanings.sent3: The robot's dutifulness in cleaning the house led to some comical mishaps.
meanings.sent4: The sun's dutifulness in rising every morning is a reminder of the cycle of life.
meanings.sent5: The employee's dutifulness in attending meetings on time impressed the boss.
